snippet.title: Eternal Dragons Auto-Battler Beginners Guide Part 3/4 - Let's Talk Shop!
snippet.description:
Episode 3 of our Auto Battler tutorial series offers a brief explanation of the in game shop mechanics. Narrated by the Eternal Dragons community streamer Bruno.
▼ 𝐂𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐤 '𝐯𝐢𝐞𝐰 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞', 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐢𝐧𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 ▼

_ _ _ _ _
💡𝐀𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐄𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐃𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐨𝐧𝐬:
Eternal Dragons is a novel IP created by Trailblazer Games to tell the story of the Eternal Dragons franchise, and power the creation of the initial four game experiences to be developed over the next couple of years.
_ _ _ _ _
Subscribe to stay up to date on Eternal Dragons news and releases!

Eternal Dragons Website: https://eternaldragons.com
Join our community Discord: https://discord.gg/eternaldragons
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/EternalDragons
Tune in to weekly streams on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/eternaldragons_ed
Look out for sneak peeks on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eternaldragons_
_ _ _ _ _
🔖 𝐓𝐚𝐠𝐬
#Web3 #Gaming #Blockchain #nfts #EternalDragons #F2P #trailblazer
